HomePage.title: Hello, I am Vlad Vagin
HomePage.textHero: Frontend and MERN-stack Web Developer who specialize in HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, NoSQL/SQL databases, REST APIs and WordPress.
HomePage.textExpertise: I specialize in creating dynamic and beautiful web pages and applications. I have extensive experience in developing REST APIs, implementing SEO and Accesibility best practices. My goal is to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that meet the needs of users.
HomePage.textWebpages: Involves creating individual pages that provide information, entertainment, or e-commerce functionality. I ensure that these pages are well-designed, responsive, and optimized for search engines.
HomePage.textWebapps: It is about creating applications that run on a web server and can be accessed by users via a web browser. I specialize in creating dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using modern technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, React and Next.
HomePage.textRestApis: Creating interfaces that allow different software applications to communicate and exchange data. I have experience in designing and implementing secure, efficient, and scalable REST APIs with Node.js.
